_sText:
About
Took me a day of mapping, an hour of optimisation, a half an hour of crying, and about 10 minutes of submission. The unique aspect of this map, is that i took the logo, and made it a map. There is a unique tunnel system throughout the letters. It all started with a sketch, in which i mapped out the tunnels. It has dynamic lighting!
Tips and Tricks
-A Key aspect of survival in this map is getting into the tunnel system quick, you'll have more cover from snipers, but are screwed from nades. -Try to take cover in the letters, in specific the A and B's, they have little rooms you can take cover in. -There are little pillars in the entrance/exits of some exits, use them from cover. -If you're a sniper, stay at spawn, or a letter near the spawn, you have more cover and have a chance to run back to spawn if needed.
